entity.name: [EC Test] Trump ends press briefing early after question on COVID-19 testing

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH President Trump, please watch the interview below. Americans need to get back to work. As you indicated in today's briefing, the virus isn't the only thing killing our citizens.  Dr. Jay Bhattacharya: His new MLB COVID-19 Study and the Dilemma of the Lockdown.
